lead_paragraph: The proposals include prohibiting antidoping employees from having an overlapping leadership role in international sports and increased funding for the World Anti-Doping Agency.

headline.print_headline: Antidoping Authorities From 17 Nations Push for a Series of Reforms
headline.main: Antidoping Authorities From 17 Nations Push for a Series of Reforms

snippet: The proposals include prohibiting antidoping employees from having an overlapping leadership role in international sports and increased funding for the World Anti-Doping Agency....
abstract: Antidoping officials from 17 countries meeting Copenhagen announce series of proposals for reforming global sports, including ban on antidoping agency employees from leadership roles in international sports.
